summary:
Adds a NEW, one-handed Mace based on Doomhammer from World of Warcraft.

Comes with its own area with encounter! Also comes in 4k, 2k and 1k Resolutions.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/91r8Y9d.png[/img][/url]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/abLjKjC.png[/img][/center]
[center][youtube]Ao-Ic-sICmA[/youtube] [youtube]EVeVTz0_nTA[/youtube] [youtube]tKIGxX1K8_I[/youtube] [youtube]kXomuuRWF5I[/youtube][/center]
[b]About:
[/b]
Doomhammer is a legendary relic that was originally crafted on a distant planet. It has been passed down through generations of Orc and now its power serves to protect the Frostwolf Clan. A portal to an outpost has recently been opened in Tamriel due to concerns of Doomhammers overwhelming power.

Appearance varies based on ENB Preset & Game Settings. Also, you don't have to like World of Warcraft to use this! 

[b][center]View on [url=https://skfb.ly/KnuH]Sketchfab[/url]![/center][/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b][color=#ffff00]What this mod includes:[/color][/b] 

[b]Doomhammer (One-Handed)[/b]
[color=#999999]28 Base Damage - Unleashes Lightning when performing a Power Attack. Reduces Elemental Damage by 50%

[/color][b]Frostwolf Outpost[/b]
[color=#999999]The area where Doomhammer must be obtained. NPC's are level 20. It has no connection to WoW other than namesake.[/color]

[center][b][color=#ff0000]Do NOT optimize the textures! Some maps are purposely uncompressed![/color][/b][/center][color=#ff0000][b]
[/b][/color][img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Obtaining:[/b]

A new portal has opened beneath the [b]Shrine of Azura[/b] and it is up to you to investigate! The Frostwolf Clan are a peaceful tribe of Orcs and will do anything to protect their home. This outpost houses Doomhammer, a greathammer so powerful that its power must be constantly contained by the the tribes Shaman. Can he hold on for much longer?

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/yVR87Bf.jpg[/img][/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Installation:[/b]

Use Nexus Mod Manager

or

Extract the downloaded archive into your Skyrim Data Folder.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Uninstall Instructions:[/b]

Remove using Nexus Mod Manager

or

Simply delete the following files:

Doomhammer - Johnskyrim.esp
Doomhammer - Johnskyrim.bsa

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Questions:

[/b]Q. Why didn't you make Thrall/Orgrim?
A. I didn't want to make it TOO representational of Warcraft. A Thrall Armor is in the works for the future :)

Q. Doomhammer has fur, where is it?
A. I tried it with and without, settled on without.

Q. Can you make this this this and this?
A. I might, but unlikely. Modding takes a long time.

Q. Can you make this do this?
A. No!

Q. What ENB are you using?
A. A modified Aeon ENB

Q. What mods are you working on/got planned?
A. Those are posted on my [url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][b]facebook[/b][/url] page!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

[b]Known Issues:[/b]

- Some of the Frostwolf Orcs AI/Pathing gets interupted. I'm new to this part of modding.
- I don't know how to do LOD's for worldspaces yet

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]

If for some reason the files do not work, cause crashes
or any other problems, please do not hesitate to contact me.

All screenshots are taken directly from the game and resized down from 1920x1080 to 1280x720. No other editing has been done.

Thanks and I hope you enjoy this Skyrim Mod! [b]Remember, modding is stressful and we do it for free![/b]

PS. DO NOT UPLOAD THIS FILE ANYWHERE ELSE!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[center]
[url=http://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/F9p2o48.png[/img]
